Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.bus

Class EventBusPublisher

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.bus.EventBusPublisher
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractInputPopup, AutosaveBrew, BottomInfoController, FileIOBrew, KeystrokeBrew, LeftTopbarController, LoggerBrew, MainController, ProgramBrew, RightTopbarController, SelectionCapability, SettingsController, ShortcutBarController, SimpleWebServerBrew, SubWindowBrew, Tool, ToolInfoController, ToolsController, UndoRedoCapability, WorkspaceBrew, WorkspaceController
public class EventBusPublisher extends Object
Convenience base class providing access to the global EventBus.

Inheritors can post or listen to events without needing to retrieve the bus.

Typical subclasses include controllers or services.
